name: Jubilant Tribble Component Library
description: A collection of reusable HTML components for the CMS environment. Refer to the main README.md for human-friendly documentation.

usage_rules.structure: Do not modify the class names or HTML structure of components. Use them exactly as provided in the files.
usage_rules.content: Inner text, image src, and link href attributes are placeholders and should always be populated with new content.

components.name: FAQ Accordion
components.description: A responsive and accessible accordion section for displaying a list of frequently asked questions.

components.name: Page Template: Hero + Sticky Nav (The Shell)
components.description: The main page template. Use this as the base for building new pages. It includes the hero section, the sticky navigation, and IMPORTANTLY, it also contains the necessary CSS to render the 'Pillar Page Snippets' correctly.

components.name: Pillar Page Content Snippet Collection
components.description: This is NOT a single component. It is a library of reusable HTML blocks (like comparison tables, feature cards, CTAs). These snippets are designed to be placed inside the 'Page Template: Hero + Sticky Nav'.
